# People (The Golden Republic EP)

| rev2       = PopMatters
| rev2Score  = 3/10
}}
People is the only EP by American rock band The Golden Republic. It was released in United States by Astralwerks on September 21, 2004.
Track listing
All tracks written by The Golden Republic.
# "You Almost Had It" – 2:51
# "Great Communication" – 3:22
# "Make It" – 4:32
# "Row of People" – 4:20
References
